pullRequest.title: Drop Android 4.4 (KitKat) support
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
LEARNER-8104

Update minSdkVersion to v21.
Remove obsoleted code written in support of KitKat.
Remove unused code.
Update Dialog text colors to increase readability and Parity with other dialogs.
Define and replace hardcoded values.

commit.message:
Drop Android 4.4 (KitKat) support
- LEARNER-8104
- Update minSdkVersion to v21

Remove obsoleted code written in support of kitkat
- Remove unused code, Update text colors to increase readability
- Remove unused files and classes
- Replace paddingLeft/Right to paddingStart/End
- Replace marginLeft/Right with marginStart/End
- Remove 'Build.Version.LOLLIPOP' checks and releated code"
- Use define dimens and color instated of hard coded
